docs.title: Lottery Simulator Web App
docs.text: This is a simple web app that simulates a lottery game. The user can enter the number of balls to draw and possible numbers. The app then generates a random number for each ticket and displays the results.

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Open index.html on your browser.
  3. Enter input values and see the generated lottery numbers and that's it.
